page.title: 06HOUSING IN IXWORTH
page.content:
TYPES: ----- 61% Houses, 37% Bungalows, 2% Flats. Of all homes 72% are owner occuppied. 28% are either rented from Suffolk County Counil or go with the job. Older properties are always houses,some being 800 years old; very few bungalows are more than 30 years old.
*************************************** OCCUPANTS: --------- 10% of homes have 1 occupant. 34% of homes have 2 occupants. 17% of homes have 3 occupants. 28% of homes have 4 occupants. 9% of homes have 5 occupants. 27% of homes have more than 5.
